text: Lalle ne, Muna ganin jujjuyawar fuskarka a cikin sama. To, lalle ne, Mu juyar da kai ga Alƙibla wadda kake yarda da ita. Sai ka juyar da fuskarka wajen Masallaci Tsararre, kuma inda duk kuka kasance, to, ku juyar da fuskokinku jiharsa. Kuma lalle ne waɗanda aka bai wa Littafi, haƙiƙa su, suna sanin lalle ne, shi ne gaskiya, daga Ubangijinka. Kuma Allah bai zama Mai gafala ba daga abin da suke aikatawa
